content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi

content: Hello Nesibe, thank you for coming to see the apartment. Based on our discussion, I am willing to offer you a rental price of 500 Euros per month.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi

content:
Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. I would like to discuss the rental price. How much are you looking for per month?

Thanks again for the opportunity to come and see the apartment.

Best regards,
Nesibe
name: Heinrich Heine
